name: LoopBlaster (MathBlaster)
description:
Prototype/WIP Platform for upcoming LRC puzzles & game ideas.  There is currently a mini-game to play to unlock [debug] prize packets. 

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Jetpack

Using a lot of oldschool/ripped Math Blaster Episode 1 files from the '90s for fun/nostalgia. Demo of some basic gameplay elements rebuilt from the original game - recreated in Unity.

Will make more/entirely custom assets at some point if any ideas take hold!
